lead_paragraph: The Atlanta Braves are scheduled to open SunTrust Park on April 13 against the San Diego Padres, according to a copy of the team's preliminary schedule obtained by The Associated Press.

headline.print_headline: APNewsBreak: Braves Set to Open Ballpark April 13 vs Padres
headline.main: APNewsBreak: Braves Set to Open Ballpark April 13 vs Padres
